<p> IndexedLineSet defines polylines using index lists corresponding to vertex coordinates. IndexedLineSet is a geometry node containing a Coordinate|CoordinateDouble node and optionally a Color|ColorRGBA node. <i>Wikipedia:</i> see <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polygonal_chain" target="_blank">Polygonal_chain</a>. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#IndexedLineSet" target="_blank">IndexedLineSet</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html" target="_blank">11 Rendering component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#Concepts" target="_blank">11.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#IndexedLineSet" target="_blank">11.4.5 IndexedLineSet</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter13PointsLinesFaces" target="_blank">Chapter 13 Points Lines Faces</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter06GeometryPointsLinesPolygons" target="_blank">Chapter 06 Geometry Points Lines Polygons</a> </li> </ul>
